backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining Game and UserProfile types, managing games and user profiles with Map storage, and providing admin-gated game management functions plus user profile access with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including homepage design, store description section, game catalog with horizontal scrolling, and WhatsApp Buy Now integration with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the Dragon Games Store application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for the application's design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Dragon Games Store title, root div for React mounting, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component setting up TanStack Router with home and admin routes, QueryClient provider, and shared layout including Header, Footer, and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/AddGameForm.tsx: Admin form component for adding games with inputs for name, image upload with progress tracking, trailer URL, description, and price, using ExternalBlob for image handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice with current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Game card component displaying game image, SALE badge, price badge in top-right corner, game name, and Buy Now button that opens WhatsApp or detail modal on click.
frontend/src/components/GameCatalog.tsx: Horizontal scrolling game catalog with left/right chevron navigation buttons that show/hide based on scroll position, displaying GameCard components for each game.
Modal component that displays detailed game information including an embedded YouTube trailer, description, price, and a WhatsApp purchase button.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with logo/title navigation to home and a conditional admin settings button shown only to admin users.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login and logout states, handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, blocking interaction until profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/StoreDescription: Static marketing section displaying store introduction, platform icons (PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox), customer count, and key features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddGame.ts: Mutation hook for adding a new game to the backend, invalidating the games query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Query hook that fetches the list of games from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity storage, and authentication status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query and mutation hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark mode) and utility classes for scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that checks authentication and admin status, displaying the AddGameForm component or access denied messages accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that renders the store description section followed by the game catalog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp URL with pre-filled message for ordering games, targeting phone number 918757242955 with dynamic price formatting.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for sidebar/chart/card components, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Dragon Games Store as a horizontal-scrolling gaming marketplace with WhatsApp integration, admin panel, Internet Identity auth, and existing features including homepage, game catalog, and admin management capabilities.
